alert.note: Alert for Coastal Nueces; Inland Nueces (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 11:31AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Nueces and south central San Patricio Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1130 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Corpus Christi International Airport, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corpus Christi, Robstown, Corpus Christi International Airport, Del Mar College Windward Campus, Cabaniss Field, Del Mar College Heritage Campus, Clarkwood, Annaville, Calallen, Downtown Corpus Christi, Corpus Christi North Beach, Edroy, Petronila, North San Pedro and Tuloso. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 1 and 20. US Highway 181 near mile marker 648. US Highway 77 between mile markers 658 and 676. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
